any other provision of law that requires Federal agency consultation or review (including the

text.#text:
Any Federal permit or authorization issued before the date of enactment of this Act for the
			 pipeline and cross-border facilities referred to in subsection (a) shall
			 remain in effect.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit

text.#text:
Any legal challenge to a Federal agency action regarding the pipeline and cross-border facilities
			 described in subsection (a), and the related facilities in the United
			 States, that are approved by this Act, and any permit, right-of-way, or
			 other action taken to construct or complete the project pursuant to
			 Federal law, shall only be subject to judicial review on direct appeal to
			 the

Nothing in this Act alters any Federal, State, or local process or condition in effect on the date
			 of enactment of this Act that is necessary to secure access from an owner
			 of private property to construct the pipeline and cross-border facilities
			 described in subsection (a).
